section.p: Represents the primary camera/equipment/room where the imaging exam was performed as known by the originating VistA system. Equivalent to File 78.6

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
A unique identifier for the camera/equipment room. (File 78.6).

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
A unique identifier for the camera/equipment room. (File 78.6).
